error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect, please try again

user.description: Provide the IP address or hostname of your Hubitat hub, along with the app ID of its Maker API instance. Optionally, provide a port number for the integration's event server to listen on, the units used for temperature sensors (F by default), and/or the URL that Hubitat should POST events to.
user.title: Connect to your Hubitat hub

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect, please try again

override_lights.description: The following devices were automatically classified as switches. Select any that should be lights instead.
override_lights.title: Switches → Lights

override_switches.description: The following devices were automatically classified as lights. Select any that should be switches instead.
override_switches.title: Lights → Switches

remove_devices.description: Select any devices managed by this integration that you'd like to remove. Typically, this would be any devices that are no longer being shared by Hubitat.
remove_devices.title: Remove devices

user.description: Configure options for Hubitat. Note that changing the Maker API app ID will cause the integration to rediscover your devices.
user.title: Hubitat options
